RE: License #: CN220269295
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems
715 Pyle Dr
Kingsford, MI 49802
Dear Ms. Hellman:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
02/24/2022. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (248) 975-5053.
Sincerely,
Pinkey Brown, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
4th Floor, Suite 4B
51111 Woodward Avenue
Pontiac, MI 48342
(248) 860-3012

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes, and does not have
a DHHS contract or fall under MISEP reporting requirements.
The agency had no regulated activity during this licensing period.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was not offered technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was not offered consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period. The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans not
related to maltreatment during this licensing period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems
continue on a regular license.
03/21/2022
